document.body:
Health Questions Find Your Best Health Questions&Answers Online Home > Health > Medicines > Are milkshakes good for you Health related question in topics Diet Nutrition .We found some answers as below for this question "Are milkshakes good for you",you can compare them. Yes, milkshakes are good for you. It's sometimes recommended by health professionals. ChaCha on! [ Source: http://www.chacha.com/question/are-milkshakes-good-for-you ] More Answers to " Are milkshakes good for you " Yes, milkshakes are good for you. It's sometimes recommended by health professionals. ChaCha on! http://www.chacha.com/question/are-milkshakes-good-for-you No, because they have too much sugar! http://wiki.answers.com/Q/Are_milkshakes_good_for_you I think that milkshakes from a machine in a fast food restaurant are probably loaded with sugar from flavored syrups. I think that if, prepared properly, a milkshake could definitely be healthy. Combine vanilla ice cream/froyo with milk and... http://answers.yahoo.com/question/index?qid=20090930071851AA0UANF Related Questions Answered on Y!Answers Are milkshakes good for building muscle? Q: I am a teenager and I want to gain muscle. I do not want to go on a french fry and dessert diet though cause I do not want to gain fat. My dad says milkshakes would be good cause they would turn into muscle since I am so active. Is that true? A: Milkshakes are trash. Eat protein or drink a protein shake instead.Milkshakes are nothing but sugar and fat. Does anyone have a good recipe of how to make milkshakes? Q: I have tried to make my own milkshake, but it didn't taske like one. I would be happy if someone could share a good recipie of a milkshake! A: ice cream and milk and put it in blender What are some good milkshakes or floats? Q: What some good shakes or floats for my moms birthday?Plz add ingredients? A: magic milk shakes1-1/2 to 2 cups ice water 1-1/2 cups nonfat dry milk powder 2/3 cup sugar 1/4 cup unsweetened cocoa 1 teaspoon vanilla 1 to 1-1/2 trays of ice cubes, as much as you can spare 2 tablespoons corn oil plus a 5-second squirt of non-stick spray for emulsification purposes Place all of the ingredients into the blender, including the oil and the non-stick spray. Use less water for thicker milk shakes and more water for shakes that are easy on your blender motor. The blender should be about 3/4's full. Place the lid on. Process for a full 2 minutes. Pour into cups and serve. Makes 4 - 12oz servings. For preparation tips please see below.Variations:Add 1 tablespoon of instant coffee for a mocha shake Add 1 very ripe banana for a chocolate banana shake Add a big spoonful of peanut butter for a decadent Chocolate Peanut Butter Shake. Add a few broken red and white candy mints for a refreshing Chocolate Mint shake. To make Vanilla Milk Shakes, omit the cocoa powder, reduce the sugar to 1/2-cup and add 1 tablespoon (yes a full tablespoon) of vanilla flavoring. For a french vanilla milk shake crack in an egg too.
